attributes.action: grant tax relief for individuals for premiums paid towards Private Medical & Dental Care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present healthcare system is under strain and many individuals and Companies are electing to pay for medical and dental treatment privately from after tax income. Surely, as they are providing some relief to the already overstreached health service, they shouldn't effectively be paying tax twice in the form of National Insurance and tax on the premiums paid towards private healthcare.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
